directions: In a medium bowl, toss together spinach, green onion stalks, and water chestnuts. Mix in the sour cream, mayonnaise, dry vegetable soup mix and dry onion soup mix.
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh spinach, stems removed, torn into small pieces
1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 (.4 ounce) packet dry vegetable soup mix
1/2 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix (optional)
title: Ultimate Spinach Dip
